description:
This is an individual contributor role. As a Linux System Administrator in Apple's Fleet Operations and Engineering team, your key responsibilities will include: 

Manage and maintain Apple’s big fleet of data systems running on Linux. 

Troubleshoot and resolve complex system issues, collaborate with teams, analyze logs/metrics to identify root causes.

Provide effective technical support to ensure high customer satisfaction.

Improve processes, enhance reliability/security, develop documentation.
preferred_qualifications:
LPIC-1, RHCSA certification or higher
Linux/UNIX-related software/scripting development in one or more of the following: Python, Shell, Perl, Ruby
Experience with Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Git, or other configuration management tools.
Experience with revision control systems like GitHub, CI/CD unit testing.
Experience with KVM, Docker, Kubernetes, Docker Swarm is a plus.
